Cain.name: Cain
Cain.desc: Web developer and cybersecurity analyst by day, piracy guide writer by night.
Cain.longdesc: Hi, I'm Cain. I'm a web developer and cybersecurity analyst by day, and a piracy guide writer by night. I'm known for being Morris Motel's developer, but I also write sometimes. **Glory to God alone.**

AnvilKilo.name: AnvilKilo
AnvilKilo.desc: A devilishly handsome autistic mess who's always on cocaine or pirating something.

MrMeatBones.name: MrMeatBones
MrMeatBones.desc: Original owner of the DeezNuts sequel, Morris Motel. Specializes in Servarr setups.

Anonymous.name: Anonymous
Anonymous.longdesc: The profile for those who wish to remain anonymous when contributing to Morris Motel.
